ECSchema.description: Main schema for the physical modeling of elements specifically used in Bridges.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement that is usually used to transmit loads from a bridge's superstructure to substructure, and usually allowing movement (displacement or rotation) in one or more degrees of freedom.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of Bearing rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific brphys:Bearing is an instance of the defined brphys:BearingType.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement modeling the portion of a beam or structural member through which loads and forces are transmitted.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of Bearing Seat rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific brphys:BearingSeat is an instance of the defined brphys:BearingSeatType.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement assembly built as an intermediate support of a bridge.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of Pier rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific brphys:Pier is an instance of the defined brphys:PierType.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement assembly built to support the start and end locations of a bridge.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of Abutment rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific brphys:Abutment is an instance of the defined brphys:AbutmentType.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement assembly built adjacent to an abutment that acts as a retaining wall.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of brphys:WingWall rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific brphys:WingWall is an instance of the defined brphys:WingWallType.

ECEntityClass.description: A bis:PhysicalElement assembly built inside a box girder or between girders, typically on a pier, to resist lateral forces and transfer them to the support.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of brphys:CrossFrame rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific brphys:CrossFrame is an instance of the defined brphys:CrossFrameType.

ECEntityClass.description: A beam-like bis:PhysicalElement assembly extending between abutments and piers, built up of beams, braces and other structural members.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of brphys:Girder rather than per-instance.

ECRelationshipClass.description: A type-instance relation; one that indicates that the specific brphys:Girder is an instance of the defined brphys:GirderType.
